heading: About
intro: I'm a wedding videographer passionate about telling your unique love story through cinematic film.
philosophy: My approach is simple: capture the authentic moments, the genuine emotions, and the real connections that make your day special. Every wedding is different, and every film should reflect that uniqueness.
workingTogether: Working together means you get a collaborator who listens, understands your vision, and brings a calm, professional presence to your day. I'm there to document your story, not to interfere with it.
